phrases: Let the Titans chase after you!
Are you trying to use us as bait again?!
The Military Police have fought well!
Now serve your duty as soldiers!
The Armored Titan plans to escape with Eren!
We have to stop him no matter what!
He is not fast enough to escape!
This time, I will not hesitate.
I will kill them both, I swear!
And if Ymir gets in my way, she is asking for it, too.
Sorry... for eating you... like that.
I bet... you are mad at me.
We came here to rescue you and Er-
I am following Reiner and Bertholdt now.
There is no future within the walls!
Outside the walls is not as bad as you think.
Especially... because there will not be anyone saying that
you are better off not being born.
I am pretty sure Titans will not be saying that to me...
Everyone has at least one or two faults!
If you can just overlook that, they are not so bad after all!
Everything you are saying and doing is not making any sense!
Could it be... that Reiner and Bertholdt threatened you?
I will fight them with you, so let me out of your hand!
I do not care if there is something you cannot tell me.
The Scouts have already gotten this close.
If only we had run right away, we probably would have been able to escape.
But because you forced us to bring Christa... at this rate, they will catch us!
Hey, Ymir... are you telling us we did all of that for nothing?
Is that really what you want?
Letting Christa rot within the walls?
Hurry up and let me go!
A long time ago, I stole the Power of the Titans from one of their comrades.
There is nothing I can do against them.
Sooner or later, they will kill me.
But... if I hand you over and cooperate with them...
and try to make it so my crime goes away.
Because you know the secrets of the wall, you are someone important to the Church.
Once this world started going to hell...
I almost died during the battle at that castle...
I will do whatever it takes to live...
I told myself I was doing it for your sake...
But really, I did it for myself.
I will always be your ally!
I will have to kill Ymir first!
I will kill everyone that gets in my way, so choose!
Ymir will be killed unless she does what Reiner and Bertholdt say!
She does not have a choice!
There is only so many lives that I actually care about.
My enemies made deciding that easy six years ago.
So... you are mistaken to seek any compassion from me.
Because right now, I am all out of time and room in my heart to care.
Christa... do you pick Eren or Ymir?
Will you get in my way, too?!
It is impossible to get him to calm down.
He is the most irritating guy there is!
I hate him as much as you do.
So let us beat him up together.
Why do not you come out of there?
This whole time... you kept quiet and deceived us?
Tell us it is all a lie!
You think you can just keep running away?
That is not going to happen!
For three years, did not we sleep under the same roof
as comrades through thick and thin?
Your odd sleeping positions were truly an art form.
After a while, we all looked forward each morning to seeing your pose...
To think you, the invader... could sleep like a log...
Remember we talked about surviving this together?
And that we would grow old, and someday we would all go out for drinks together?
What were you guys thinking this whole time?
What is it even matter anymore?
Just focus on cutting open his neck.
If you hesitate for a moment, we will not be able to get Eren back.
That is all there is to know.
Who the hell would want to kill people by their own choice?!
Who the hell would like doing this sort of thing?!
Do you think I wanted to do this?!
We have done such terrible things, we deserve to die.
Things we will never be able to take back...
But... we just... could not come to terms with our sins.
The only time we had some respite... was when we pretended to be soldiers.
It is true we may have deceived everyone, but it is not all a lie!
Neither of us have any right to even apologize.
Someone has to be the one to do it.
Someone has to be the one to stain their hands with blood.
What the hell is that Erwin thinking?
He is leading a horde of Titans this way!
Information Available for Public Disclosure Special Titan Powers
Among the Titans, there are those with special powers.
The intense, high temperature steam of the Colossal Titan and the hardened skin of the Armored Titan are prime examples.
It remains unknown how they possess such abilities.
Get far away from the Titans!
The fate of humanity will be determined in this very moment!
There is no future where humanity can inhabit these lands without Eren!
We recover Eren and immediately retreat!
Something is wrong with their heads.
Unless I tear these Titans off me, it will only get worse.
Cannot you see all those Titans?!
How do you plan on getting through that mess?
You would have to slip through a horde of'them.
We have come this far already.
We are taking Eren home with us.
We are going back to our hometown.
This is all because I got caught.
Everyone is going to die because of me.
What do I have to abandon?
Are you two okay with this?
Leaving behind your comrade and returning home?
You know where she is at?
Far north, deep underground in the Utopia District... and being tortured.
It was her screams that taught us something.
That even with her body's healing, you can never get rid of the pain.
They are taking special care to ensure she does not die.
And as we speak, they are not giving her body any rest.
They are torturing her every way they know how.
What the hell are you doing?!
Let us hurry home and chow down!
Ymir said if I do not go with her, Reiner and Bertholdt are going to kill her!
If she hands me in, they will let her go free!
We were going to go with them!
Of course that is a lie!
You think the one who fought like
a maniac to save you would do something like that?
The only time Ymir ever shows some effort is when you are in trouble.
I do not know about her getting killed, but...
If you two stay here any longer,
there is a huge chance that you will die and it will only get worse!
You know, even an idiot could figure that out.
He is tossing Titans like a madman!
Eren encounters the very Titan that devoured his mother.
Unable to move his body, Hannes steps in to protect him.
Not knowing what to brandish their swords against, the Scouts battle on.
Where will they ever find the future that they pursue?
